name: banka
description: Banka is a light-weight core banking application that powers banking operations like account creation, customer deposit and withdrawals.

scripts.ui:win32: browser-sync start --server --files 'UI/**/*.css, UI/**/*.html, UI/**/*.js, !node_modules/**/*' --directory --port 7777 --browser "C:\Program Files\Firefox Developer Edition\firefox.exe"
scripts.ui:darwin:linux: browser-sync start --server --files 'UI/**/*.css, UI/**/*.html, UI/**/*.js, !node_modules/**/*' --directory --port 7777 --browser 'Firefox Developer Edition'

author: Timi Tejumola
